course_description: Hands-on exploration of the editorial and publication process shaping different fields, genres and venues. Focus on mechanics of publication, various forums and opportunities for publication germane to student work in different disciplines, and professional opportunities in non-fiction publishing.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 5731, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 10-11:15a, Instructor: R. Birdwell, Status: Closed
